title: About Us
hero.title: Connecting Learners with Quality Education
hero.subtitle: FindClass.nz is dedicated to helping students in New Zealand discover the perfect classes while giving great teachers the recognition they deserve.
story.title: Our Story
story.content1: FindClass.nz was born from a simple belief: quality education should be accessible to everyone, without being blocked by high intermediary fees. We noticed that many talented teachers in New Zealand struggle to reach students, while students often find it difficult to discover the right classes for their needs.
story.content2: Our platform bridges this gap by creating a transparent, efficient marketplace where teachers can showcase their expertise and students can find courses that match their learning goals. We're committed to building trust through quality data, real reviews, and a commitment to privacy.
mission.title: Our Mission
mission.freeTutors.title: Free for Tutors
mission.freeTutors.description: Individual tutors join completely free. We believe great teachers shouldn't have to pay to share their knowledge.
mission.freeStudents.title: Free for Students
mission.freeStudents.description: Students use the platform completely free. Search, browse, and book without any hidden fees.
mission.transparency.title: Real Reviews
mission.transparency.description: Transparent reviews ensure you can make informed decisions about your learning journey.
